headline: POSCO Unit Invests in Factorial to Strengthen Solid-State Battery
summary: PKX's POSCO Future M unit invests to deepen a solid-state battery partnership, boosting materials supply, safety and growth across emerging EV and AI uses.

raw.headline: POSCO Unit Invests in Factorial to Strengthen Solid-State Battery

headline: PPG Industries' Earnings Lag Estimates in Q4, Revenues Up Y/Y
summary: PPG posts Q4 earnings miss despite 5% revenue growth, with all three coating segments topping sales estimates.

raw.headline: PPG Industries' Earnings Lag Estimates in Q4, Revenues Up Y/Y
